DOC.brief_summary: Know through routine clinical practice the effectiveness and safety of current treatment of hepatitis C virus, genotype 1, for patients who have never been treated and for patients who have been previously treated
DOC.brief_title: Register of Telaprevir and Boceprevir in Routine Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Patients infected by hepatitis C virus, genotype 1 Indication of treatment with telaprevir or boceprevir in F3 and F4 fibrosis Being taking part in other Inability to follow a monitoring Contraindications on triple therapy Coinfected with HIV and HBV (hepatitis B virus)
